meanings.definition: A person or machine that creates pleats in fabric.
meanings.sent1: The pleaters at the tailor shop are very skilled at creating beautiful pleats in dresses.
meanings.sent2: I need to buy a new pleaters for my sewing projects.
meanings.sent3: The pleaters and the sewing machine had a pleating competition to see who could make the fanciest design.
meanings.sent4: The pleaters worked tirelessly, transforming the plain fabric into a work of art.
meanings.sent5: The pleaters' precision and expertise were evident in every pleat they made.

meanings.definition: A tool used for creating pleats in fabric.
meanings.sent1: My grandmother's antique pleaters is still in perfect condition.
meanings.sent2: I borrowed Sarah's pleaters to finish my project on time.
meanings.sent3: The pleaters and the iron had a race to see which could create the neatest pleats.
meanings.sent4: The pleaters in my sewing kit are like magic wands, turning plain fabric into something special.
meanings.sent5: Using the pleaters made the task of pleating the fabric much easier.
